container.heading: Transportation Planning Process — The Action Plan

para.text: In this chapter, the following document is incorporated by reference.
Document Incorporated. The Maryland Action Plan (Maryland Department of Transportation, State Highway Administration, December, 1993).
The planning process for State highway and other transportation projects; and

Designed to assure that adequate consideration is given to possible social, economic, and environmental effects of proposed projects, and that decisions on these projects are made in the best overall public interest.
The Action Plan establishes the organizational arrangements, the assignment of responsibilities, and the procedures to be followed to assure that:
The social, economic, and environmental effects of proposed projects are identified;
Alternative courses of action are considered; and
Other governmental agencies and the public are involved throughout the planning process.
